title: What Videogame did you play that you found was absolutely PERFECT: 10/10
body:
For me it was Chrono Trigger for SNES

I fucking loved that game and would consider it heaven if I could only play it for the rest of my days. 

It was the only RPG I played that had good graphics (for its time), good gameplay, and good story. I love that game to death. 

What's urs?
